description: Get a quick overview of your Quobyte Storage

targets.expr:
max(quobyte_osd_storage_io_error{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_osd_storage_crc_error{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_command_timeout{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_crc_error_count{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_current_pending_sector{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_device_life_left{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) < 20 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_offline_uncorrectable{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_reallocated_sector_ct{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0 OR
  max(quobyte_device_smart_reported_uncorrect{quobyte_cluster="$setup"}) by (device_id, __name__) > 0

panels.description: Based on growth of last 2 weeks
panels.title: Usage in 30d

title: Quobyte Dashboard 3.x
